title: Former Prince Andrew Is Accused of Misconduct in Public Office: What to Know
summary_full: In Britain, the offense carries a maximum sentence of life in prison. No case has ever tested whether a member of Britain’s royal family could be considered a public officer.
summary_public: In Britain, the offense carries a maximum sentence of life in prison. No case has ever tested whether a member of Britain’s royal family could be considered a public officer.
